import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid' const [burgerStatus, setBurgerStatus] = useState(false); function Header() { return (
{/* menu */}
Model S Model 3 Model X Model Y
{/* Right Menu */}
Shop Tesla Account
{/* Burger Navigation Bar */}
{/* when you have a flex inside of a flex, the flex on the inside will always lose. */}
